fieldDescription: Reduce the amount of effects in the custom mission battles
Strikecraft can't be repaired over starting HP at deployment.
Strikecraft can't recover over starting CR at deployment.
Hull percentage that strikecraft will return to carrier for repairs. Higher values generally offer more survivability as you progress into the late game.
Double Tap time delay to Quick/Assault Boost. The lower the value, the shorter the input window.
Ships with recall device will automatically recall the player if they overload. If disabled, will not unless below a certain HP or holding fire is toggled on
